trans-unit.source: Interface that is used by the host infrastructure for property editing to handle sorting and filtering functionality.
trans-unit.target: 主機基礎結構針對屬性編輯所使用的介面，用以處理排序和篩選功能。

trans-unit.source: It is used to determine whether a particular object should be filtered out.
trans-unit.target: 使用此介面可以判斷是否應該篩選出特定的物件。

trans-unit.source: Used to set a new <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyFilter" /> on the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.IPropertyFilterTarget" />.

Declaration of the event raised when a <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyFilter" /> is changed through a call to <see cref="M:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.IPropertyFilterTarget.ApplyFilter(System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyFilter)" />.
trans-unit.target: 透過呼叫 <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyFilter" /> 變更<see cref="M:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.IPropertyFilterTarget.ApplyFilter(System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyFilter)" /> 時所引發之事件的宣告。

trans-unit.source: Read-only property that returns <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyFilter" /> is a match for the object.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyFilter" /> 是物件的相符項目，則為傳回 <see langword="true" /> 的唯讀屬性。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the property filter matches the property filter target; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果屬性篩選與屬性篩選目標相符，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Used to determine whether this <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.IPropertyFilterTarget" /> is a match for a particular <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyFilterPredicate" />.
trans-unit.target: 用於判斷此 <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.IPropertyFilterTarget" /> 是否為特定 <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyFilterPredicate" /> 的相符項目。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if it there is a match between a property filter target and a property filter predicate; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果在屬性篩選目標和屬性篩選述詞之間有相符項目，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。
